title: PSA Still not buying RP
body:
Until pyke is fixed. Its been since the before release of the project skins i have not bought any rp. I would love to buy the project skins and SG skins hell i would of even bought the boundles with boarders and icons but nope wont buy any RP until this champion gets gutted. If that doesn't happen oh well guess i'll find something else to spend my money on. Cheers
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
